import React from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import ScrollAnimation from 'react-animate-on-scroll'; const fakeData = [ { id: 1, name: "Walailak Day", detail: "รายละเอียด.", place: "สนามกีฬา1", price: 200, compet_start: "2020-01-01", compet_end: "2020-01-01", start: "2020-01-01", end: "2020-01-01", pay_end: "2020-01-01", //gens: [Competition_Gen] }, { id: 2, name: "Walailak Day2", detail: "รายละเอียด..", place: "สนามกีฬา2", price: 300, compet_start: "2020-01-01", compet_end: "2020-01-01", start: "2020-01-01", end: "2020-01-01", pay_end: "2020-01-01", //gens: [Competition_Gen] }, { id: 3, name: "Walailak Day3", detail: "รายละเอียด...", place: "สนามกีฬา3", price: 600, compet_start: "2020-01-01", compet_end: "2020-01-01", start: "2020-01-01", end: "2020-01-01", pay_end: "2020-01-01", //gens: [Competition_Gen] } ] function Competition() { return (

React Animate On Scroll

Badminton Competitions {fakeData.map(prod => ( {prod.name} สถานที่ : {prod.place} ค่าสมัคร : {prod.price} วันสิ้นสุดจ่ายเงิน : {prod.pay_end} วันรับสมัคร : {prod.start} วันสิ้นสุดรับสมัคร : {prod.end} วันเริ่มการแข่งขัน : {prod.compet_start} วันสิ้นสุดการแข่งขัน : {prod.compet_end} ))} ) } const divstyle = { display: 'grid', justifyContent: 'center' } const card = { border: "outset", padding: 10, margin: 10 } const Title = { fontSize: 120 } const SubTitle = { fontSize: 30 } export default Competition;
